gradMethod.ch:
1. Term project (group based)
-- Term project presentation (I) (oral): 10% 
-- Term project presentation (II) (oral): 25%
-- Term project presentation (III): 25%
2. Midterm exam (Written test): 20%
3. Final exam (Written test): 20%
gradMethod.en:
1. Term project (group based)
-- Term project presentation (I) (proposal): 10% 
-- Term project presentation (II): 25%
-- Term project presentation (III): 25%
2. Midterm exam (Written test): 20%
3. Final exam (Written test): 20%
